summary: Defines an abstract Backend class that serves as a pluggable interface between raster vision tasks and external machineâ€‘learning libraries, encapsulating model lifecycle actions such as loading, training, inference, and data preprocessing.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, extensible mechanism for integrating diverse ML frameworks into the raster vision workflow, allowing developers to implement custom backends that manage model creation, training, prediction, and preprocessing without coupling the core system to a specific library.
